zombie_tactics.configuration.Animals.hur: Animal targeting priority (lower values mean higher priority). Do not change if you don't know what it is
Does animal targeting require line of sight
zombie_tactics.configuration.Mining.do_m: Zombies attempt to break blocks in order to reach to a target
zombie_tactics.configuration.Mining.mine: Block breaking goal priority. Do not change if you don't know what it is
zombie_tactics.configuration.Mining.mini: The amount of mining progress made per tick
zombie_tactics.configuration.Mining.max_: Maximum hardness the zombies can mine
The maximum hardness of targeted blocks. For example, Iron block is 5
zombie_tactics.configuration.Mining.hard: Target block hardness multiplier, and doesn't affect block selection. Mining progress = hardnessMultiplier * block hardness
zombie_tactics.configuration.Climbing.do: Should zombies climb each other on collision
zombie_tactics.configuration.General.hea: The amount of heal when a zombie attacks somewhat
zombie_tactics.configuration.General.agg: Walk speed when a zombie is mad
zombie_tactics.configuration.General.sun: Zombie is sensitive to the sun
